name: Brown Hat, Red Hat Cowboy POW! (OLD)
name_original: Brown Hat, Red Hat Cowboy POW! (OLD)
description:
Originally created for the Ludum Dare 26 competition. Original entry can be found HERE.

A Windows download is also available HERE.

----------------------------

This is a fairly simple game, in which you have to kill the bartender! Hectic, brain-numbing fun ensues!

Instructions in-game.

WARNING: LOTS OF FLASHING LIGHTS AND SHAKING
